algorithm

类 MF2DBoolean

  • java.lang.Object
    • datamodel.RatingSystem2DBoolean
      • algorithm.MF2DBoolean
  • 直接已知子类:
    MF2DBooleanIncremental

    public class MF2DBoolean
extends RatingSystem2DBoolean
    Implement two matrix factorization algorithms.
    Project: Three-way conversational recommendation.
    版本:
    1.0
    作者:
    Fan Min
    www.fansmale.com, github.com/fansmale/TCR.
    Email: minfan@swpu.edu.cn, minfanphd@163.com.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      (专用程序包) double alpha
      A parameter for controlling learning regular.
      (专用程序包) double[][] itemSubspace
      The item matrix V.
      (专用程序包) double lambda
      A parameter for controlling the learning speed.
      static int NO_REGULAR
      No regular scheme.
      static int PQ_REGULAR
      No regular scheme.
      (专用程序包) int rank
      The low rank of the small matrices.
      (专用程序包) int regularScheme
      Regular scheme.
      (专用程序包) double subspaceValueRange
      The range for the initial value of subspace values.
      (专用程序包) int trainRounds
      How many rounds for training.
      (专用程序包) double[][] userSubspace
      The user matrix U.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • MF2DBoolean

        public MF2DBoolean(java.lang.String paraFilename,
                   int paraNumUsers,
                   int paraNumItems,
                   int paraNumRatings,
                   double paraRatingLowerBound,
                   double paraRatingUpperBound)
        The first constructor.
        参数:
        paraFilename - The data filename.
        paraNumUsers - The number of users.
        paraNumItems - The number of items.
        paraNumRatings - The number of ratings.
        paraRatingLowerBound - The lower bound of ratings.
        paraRatingUpperBound - The upper bound of ratings.
